channel.title: Trey Parker on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘South Park’ Creators Reveal Network Battle Over Premiere’s Trump Penis as They Joke: “We’re Terribly Sorry”
item.description: Their Comic-Con panel took place the day after the controversial ‘South Park’ season 27 premiere earned the ire of President Donald Trump and showed a version of him lying naked in bed with Satan.

item.title: ‘South Park’ Creators Reveal Network Battle Over Premiere’s Trump Penis as They Joke: “We’re Terribly Sorry”
item.description: Their Comic-Con panel took place the day after the controversial ‘South Park’ season 27 premiere earned the ire of President Donald Trump and showed a version of him lying naked in bed with Satan.

item.title: White House Slams ‘South Park’ as “Desperate” for Attention After Unflattering Depiction of Trump
item.description: The season 27 premiere of the series finally saw its creators bring a satirical depiction of the president to the show.

item.title: White House Slams ‘South Park’ as “Desperate” for Attention After Unflattering Depiction of Trump
item.description: The season 27 premiere of the series finally saw its creators bring a satirical depiction of the president to the show.

item.title: ‘South Park’ Takes on Trump in Season 27 Premiere as Creators Ink $1.5 Billion Deal
item.description: The long-running satire returns after a nearly 2.5-year hiatus and as a battle over its future has just concluded.

item.title: ‘South Park’ Takes on Trump in Season 27 Premiere as Creators Ink $1.5 Billion Deal
item.description: The long-running satire returns after a nearly 2.5-year hiatus and as a battle over its future has just concluded.

item.title: ‘South Park’ Lives: Paramount Inks New Deal With Creators, Library Moving to Paramount+
item.description: Trey Parker and Matt Stone had been in a heated dispute with Paramount and its incoming owners Skydance over the future of their deal with the company.

item.title: ‘South Park’ Lives: Paramount Inks New Deal With Creators, Library Moving to Paramount+
item.description: Trey Parker and Matt Stone had been in a heated dispute with Paramount and its incoming owners Skydance over the future of their deal with the company.
